list.name: Default
list.comment:
[Working] Corrected one error after merge.
We need to set up drag and drop functionality for SmallQuickBarFragment so we can drag a directory onto the current item location. Also I think we should

task.summary: Added static strings for content provider query and started implementing LoaderCallbacks.

Began implementation of QuickBarFragment. Untested. Commented out much of the QuickBar implementation that was in MainActivity and moved it to QuickBarFragment. Added callbacks from QuickBarFragment to ensure data from MainActivity was available when needed. Declared base implementation of a QuickBarAdapter but this is unfinished. Set the adapter member to be a SimpleCursorAdapter for testing purposes, but this is untested at the moment.
QuickBarFragment with working SimpleCursorAdapter ListView. TODO: Filter data being displayed to just directories. Figure out thumbnail display.

Working LoaderManagerFragment and initial implementation of ManagedList
MainActivity still does not use these in a useful way, but a LoaderManagerFragment is initialized and used to load MediaStore.Images.Media.EXTERNAL_CONTENT_URI. I had to implement a pendingLoad list to process LoaderManagerFragment.load() calls that are made before onAttach() is called because Loader initialization requires the getActivity() call which is not available until after onAttach(). LoaderManagerFragment.load() still returns the id of the loader to be initialized so the Main thread can continue. LoaderManagerFragment will need to verify the load is finished before providing any data requested of it.
ManagedList initial implementation is complete but untested. All methods that modify the list are overridden to throw UnsupportedOperationException in favor of implementations that verify that a registered manager is making the modification request and subsequently notify all registered observers of modification.
Began implementation of DatabaseSubset nested class for LoaderManagerFragment.

Added ThumbnailAsyncTask and ThumbnailCache for performance
Also cleaned up unused code and renamed some for clarity.
[Working] Locked screen orientation and reduced overdraw.

[Working] Cleaned up unused imports.
Drag and drop seems to work great! Now we just need to figure out the best way to handle database changes. Whether it is saving and deleting old versions, or modifying MediaStore values directly.

[Working] Added a GridView with directory data to the DirectoryPane
Still need to adjust padding values to make it look nice.

[Working] Changed style and added directory choosing functionality to DirectoryFragment.
You can now click on an item in the directory gridview to its images to the content pane. Loading is still a little laggy if you click too many.

MESSAGE.value: Working sliding pane. Need to figure how to make it slide the opposite direction.
Added static strings for content provider query and started implementing LoaderCallbacks.

Began implementation of QuickBarFragment. Untested. Commented out much of the QuickBar implementation that was in MainActivity and moved it to QuickBarFragment. Added callbacks from QuickBarFragment to ensure data from MainActivity was available when needed. Declared base implementation of a QuickBarAdapter but this is unfinished. Set the adapter member to be a SimpleCursorAdapter for testing purposes, but this is untested at the moment.
QuickBarFragment with working SimpleCursorAdapter ListView. TODO: Filter data being displayed to just directories. Figure out thumbnail display.

Working LoaderManagerFragment and initial implementation of ManagedList
MainActivity still does not use these in a useful way, but a LoaderManagerFragment is initialized and used to load MediaStore.Images.Media.EXTERNAL_CONTENT_URI. I had to implement a pendingLoad list to process LoaderManagerFragment.load() calls that are made before onAttach() is called because Loader initialization requires the getActivity() call which is not available until after onAttach(). LoaderManagerFragment.load() still returns the id of the loader to be initialized so the Main thread can continue. LoaderManagerFragment will need to verify the load is finished before providing any data requested of it.
ManagedList initial implementation is complete but untested. All methods that modify the list are overridden to throw UnsupportedOperationException in favor of implementations that verify that a registered manager is making the modification request and subsequently notify all registered observers of modification.
Began implementation of DatabaseSubset nested class for LoaderManagerFragment.

Abandoned managed data set impementation. Added "DISTINCT "
Implementation of managed data sets was becomming overly complicated. After more research on Loader and SQLite I found adding the "DISTINCT" flag was the easiest way to get a list of unique BUCKET_IDs. The Loader framework does not support this directly, however I found that adding the String "DISTINCT " to the first column in the projection array accomplished the same result. MainActivity will support callbacks from LoaderManagerFragment to handle onLoadFinished and onLoaderReset calls.
QuickBarFragment now has a helper class called Item, a wrapper for data used for display. MainActivity will be in charge of giving QuickBarFragment a List<Item> to display. It will construct that list from data received in the LoaderManagerFragment callbacks. A similar implementation should be used for DirectoryFragment.
I also renamed some classes and removed unused ones to clean up the environment.

Added ThumbnailAsyncTask and ThumbnailCache for performance
Also cleaned up unused code and renamed some for clarity.
[Working] Locked screen orientation and reduced overdraw.

[Working] Cleaned up unused imports.
Drag and drop seems to work great! Now we just need to figure out the best way to handle database changes. Whether it is saving and deleting old versions, or modifying MediaStore values directly.

[Working] Added a GridView with directory data to the DirectoryPane
Still need to adjust padding values to make it look nice.

[Working] Changed style and added directory choosing functionality to DirectoryFragment.
You can now click on an item in the directory gridview to its images to the content pane. Loading is still a little laggy if you click too many.
